io.janusproject.services

Interface DependentService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContextSpaceService, DistributedDataStructureService, ExecutorService, KernelDiscoveryService, LogService, NetworkService, SpawnService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDependentService, AbstractNetworkingExecutionThreadService, AbstractNetworkingService, ArakhneLocaleLogService, EmptyLogService, HazelcastDistributedDataStructureService, HazelcastInfrastructureService, HazelcastKernelDiscoveryService, JdkExecutorService, NoNetworkService, StandardContextSpaceService, StandardDistributedDataStructureService, StandardKernelDiscoveryService, StandardSpawnService, ZeroMQNetworkService

    public interface DependentService
extends Service
    This service is dependent on other services.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceType

        Class<? extends Service> getServiceType()
        Replies the service interface implemented by this service.
        Returns:
        the service interface.

      • getServiceDependencies

        Collection<Class<? extends Service>> getServiceDependencies()
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        If one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will way until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Returns:
        the dependencies.
        See Also:
        getServiceWeakDependencies()

      • getServiceWeakDependencies

        Collection<Class<? extends Service>> getServiceWeakDependencies()
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        Even if one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will never wait until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Returns:
        the dependencies.
        See Also:
        getServiceDependencies()
